## Examples

```{r setup}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  results = 'asis',
  tidy.opts=list(width.cutoff=60),
  tidy=TRUE, 
  echo = FALSE,
  dev = "svglite",
      fig.ext = ".svg"
)
```

```{r}
librarian::shelf('tidyverse', 'gghutchins')
ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy, colour = class)) + 
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_hutchins('cool') +
  theme_hutchins() +
  labs(title = 'Here is a plot',
       subtitle = 'With a subtitle')

```
